description.german: Besiedle einen Planeten.

description.schinese: 殖民星球
description.turkish: Bir Gezegeni Kolonileştir
description.brazilian: Colonize um planeta
description.japanese: 惑星を発見し、入植する

displayName.french: On en a plein la vue
displayName.spanish: La tierra que baña la luz

description.german: Besiedle einen innersten Planeten.
description.french: Colonisez une des planètes les plus proches.
description.italian: Colonizza un pianeta più interno
description.spanish: Coloniza un planeta interior.
description.schinese: 殖民最里面的星球
description.russian: Заселите самую ближнюю к солнцу планету.
description.turkish: En içteki Gezegeni Kolonileştir
description.brazilian: Colonize um planeta mais próximo do sol
description.japanese: 最も内側にある惑星を発見し、入植する

description.german: Besiedle einen äußersten Planeten.
description.french: Colonisez une des planètes les plus éloignées.
description.italian: Colonizza un pianeta più esterno
description.spanish: Coloniza un planeta exterior.
description.schinese: 殖民最外面的星球
description.russian: Заселите самую дальнюю от солнца планету.
description.turkish: En dıştaki Gezegeni Kolonileştir
description.brazilian: Colonize um planeta mais distante do sol
description.japanese: 最も外側にある惑星を発見し、入植する

description.german: Überstehe einen Walangriff.
description.french: Survivez à une attaque de baleine.
description.italian: Sopravvivi all'attacco di una balena
description.spanish: Sobrevive a un ataque de ballenas.
description.schinese: 在鲸鱼攻击中存活
description.turkish: Bir balina saldırısından sağ kurtul
description.brazilian: Sobreviva a um ataque de baleia
description.japanese: クジラの襲撃から生還する

description.english: Prevent a Whale attack with a Space Elevator
description.german: Verhindere einen Walangriff mit einem Weltraumaufzug.
description.french: Empêchez une attaque de baleine avec un ascenseur spatial.
description.italian: Previeni l'attacco di una balena con un ascensore spaziale
description.spanish: Evita un ataque de ballenas con un ascensor espacial.
description.schinese: 用太空电梯阻止鲸鱼袭击
description.russian: Используйте космический лифт, чтобы предотвратить нападение кита.
description.turkish: Uzay Asansörü ile bir Balina Saldırısını engelle
description.brazilian: Impeça um ataque de baleia com um Elevador Espacial
description.japanese: 宇宙エレベーターでクジラの襲撃を防ぐ

description.german: Spiele das Spiel durch.
description.french: Terminez le jeu.
description.italian: Completa il gioco
description.spanish: Completa el juego.
description.schinese: 完成游戏
description.turkish: Oyunu bitir
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo
description.japanese: ゲームをクリアする

description.german: Zähme einen Minotaurus.
description.french: Domptez un Minotaure.
description.italian: Doma un minotauro
description.spanish: Doma un minotauro.
description.schinese: 驯服牛头人
description.turkish: Bir Minotor evcilleştir
description.brazilian: Dome um Minotauro
description.japanese: ミノタウロスを手なずける

description.german: Zähme ein Kobold-Nest.
description.french: Domptez un nid entier de Gobelins.
description.italian: Doma un nido di gremlin
description.spanish: Doma un nido de gremlins.
description.schinese: 驯服小妖精巢穴
description.turkish: Bir Cincüce evcilleştir
description.brazilian: Dome um ninho de Gremlins
description.japanese: グレムリンの巣を手なずける

description.german: Zähme eine Sphinx.
description.french: Domptez un Sphinx.
description.italian: Doma una sfinge
description.spanish: Doma una esfinge.
description.schinese: 驯服斯芬克斯
description.turkish: Bir Sfenks evcilleştir
description.brazilian: Dome uma Esfinge
description.japanese: スフィンクスを手なずける

description.german: Zähme einen Kraken.
description.french: Domptez un Kraken.
description.italian: Doma un kraken
description.spanish: Doma un kraken.
description.schinese: 驯服海怪
description.turkish: Bir Kraken evcilleştir
description.brazilian: Dome um Kraken
description.japanese: クラーケンを手なずける

description.english: Repair the Ship in 15 in-game minutes
description.german: Repariere das Schiff in 15 Spielminuten.
description.french: Réparez le navire en 15 minutes de jeu.
description.italian: Ripara la nave in 15 minuti di gioco
description.spanish: Repara el buque en 15 minutos del juego.
description.schinese: 在游戏内分钟15分内修好船
description.turkish: Gemiyi 15 oyun dakikası içinde onar
description.brazilian: Conserte o navio em 15 minutos do jogo
description.japanese: ゲーム内時間で15分以内に船を修理する

description.english: Repair the Spaceship in 90 in-game minutes
description.german: Repariere das Raumschiff in 90 Spielminuten.
description.french: Réparez le vaisseau en 90 minutes de jeu.
description.italian: Ripara l'astronave in 90 minuti di gioco
description.spanish: Repara la aeronave en 90 minutos del juego.
description.schinese: 在游戏内分钟90分内修好宇宙飞船
description.russian: Отремонтируйте космический корабль за 90 игровых минут.
description.turkish: Uzay Gemisini 90 oyun dakikası içinde onar
description.brazilian: Conserve a espaçonave em 90 minutos do jogo
description.japanese: ゲーム内時間で90分以内に宇宙船を修理する

description.german: Baue 100 Hütten über alle Spiele hinweg.
description.french: Construisez 100 cabanes toutes parties confondues.
description.italian: Costruisci 100 capanne in totale nelle partite
description.spanish: Construye 100 chozas entre todas las partidas.
description.schinese: 在所有游戏中累计建造100个小屋
description.turkish: Tüm oyunlar genelinde 100 Kulübe inşa et
description.brazilian: Construa 100 Cabanas ao longo de todas as partidas
description.japanese: 小屋を100回建設する

description.english: Make a Tool at a Toolsmith
description.german: Fertige ein Werkzeug in der Werkzeugschmiede.
description.french: Fabriquez un outil dans la forge à outils.
description.italian: Fabbrica un attrezzo in una fabbrica di attrezzi
description.spanish: Forja una herramienta en la herrería.
description.schinese: 在工具作坊制作工具
description.turkish: Alet Fabrikasında bir Alet Yap
description.brazilian: Faça uma ferramenta numa Ferraria
description.japanese: 島の人口を100人以上にして、全員をアパートに居住させ、幸福な状態にする。さらに噴水を10個設置し、島に汚染がないようにする

description.german: Klicke auf einen Frosch.
description.french: Cliquez sur une grenouille.
description.italian: Fai clic su una rana
description.spanish: Haz clic sobre una rana.
description.schinese: 点击青蛙
description.turkish: Bir kurbağaya tıkla
description.brazilian: Clique num sapo
description.japanese: 道具製作所で道具を作る

description.english: Hide all Peeps on a Planet in Shelters during a Whale attack
description.german: Verstecke während eines Walangriffs alle Bürger eines Planeten in Schutzräumen.
description.french: Faites entrer tous les Bonzommes d'une planète dans un abri quand une baleine attaque.
description.italian: Nascondi tutti gli abitanti di un pianeta dentro i rifugi durante l'attacco di una balena
description.spanish: Esconde a los compas de un planeta en refugios durante un ataque de ballenas.
description.schinese: 让星球上所有的小屁人在鲸鱼袭击期间躲在避难所里
description.russian: Спрячьте всех жителей планеты в убежищах перед нападением кита.
description.turkish: Balina saldırısı sırasında Gezegendeki tüm İnsanları Sığınaklara Gizle
description.brazilian: Esconda todos os Migs de um planeta em abrigos durante um ataque de baleia
description.japanese: カエルをクリックする

description.english: Fully protect a Planet with a Shield
description.german: Schütze einen Planeten vollständig mit einem Schutzschild.
description.french: Protégez une planète entière à l'aide d'un bouclier.
description.italian: Proteggi completamente un pianeta con un'egida
description.spanish: Protege un planeta con un escudo.
description.schinese: 用护盾完整保护一个星球
description.turkish: Bir Gezegeni Kalkan ile tamamen koru
description.brazilian: Proteja um planeta inteiro com um Escudo
description.japanese: クジラの襲撃中、惑星上のすべての小人をシェルターに避難させる

description.english: Have 100+ Peeps on Island, all of them happy and living in Apartments.  Also have 10 Fountains and no pollution on that Island
description.german: Habe 100+ Bürger auf der Insel, die alle zufrieden sind und in Apartments leben.  Die Insel muss zudem 10 Springbrunnen haben und es darf keine Verschmutzung geben.
description.french: Atteignez 100 Bonzommes ou plus sur une île. Tous heureux et vivant en appartement.  Vous devez aussi placer 10 fontaines, mais ne créer aucune pollution sur l'île.
description.italian: Fai in modo che la popolazione dell'isola superi i 100 abitanti, tutti felici e alloggiati in appartamenti.  Inoltre, sempre su quell'isola, costruisci 10 fontane e fai in modo che non ci sia inquinamento
description.spanish: Ten una isla con más de 100 compas felices y viviendo en apartamentos.  Además, coloca 10 fuentes y elimina la contaminación.
description.schinese: 岛上共有100名以上的小屁人，且全部满意，全部住进公寓。岛屿上有10个喷泉，且没有污染
description.russian: Поселите на острове и обеспечьте апартаментами не менее 100 счастливых людей.  Также на этом острове нужно построить 10 фонтанов и не допустить загрязнения.
description.turkish: Adada 100'den fazla İnsan bulunsun, hepsi mutlu olsun ve Apartmanlarda yaşasın.  Söz konusu Adada ayrıca 10 Fıskiye olsun ve kirlilik olmasın
description.brazilian: Tenha uma ilha com mais de 100 Migs, todos felizes e morando em Apartamentos  Além disso, tenha 10 Chafarizes e zero poluição nessa ilha
description.japanese: 惑星をシールドで完全に包む

description.german: Kolonisiere 7 Planeten in 1 Spiel.
description.french: Colonisez 7 planètes au cours d'une partie.
description.italian: Colonizza 7 pianeti in 1 partita
description.spanish: Coloniza siete planetas en la misma partida.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏内殖民7个星球
description.turkish: 1 oyunda 7 Gezegeni kolonileştir
description.brazilian: Colonize 7 Planetas em 1 partida
description.japanese: 1回のゲームで7つの惑星を発見する

description.english: Have all Peeps wearing Good Clothing
description.german: Alle Bürger müssen gute Kleidung tragen.
description.french: Habillez tous vos Bonzommes de vêtements de qualité.
description.italian: Fai indossare abiti di qualità a tutti gli abitanti
description.spanish: Viste con prendas buenas a todos los compas.
description.schinese: 所有小屁人穿上优质衣服
description.turkish: Tüm İnsanlar Kaliteli Kıyafet giyiyor olsun
description.brazilian: Vista todos os Migs com Roupas de Boa Qualidade
description.japanese: すべての小人たちに上質な衣服を着せる

description.english: Have one Island with 300+ Peeps on it, all with homes
description.german: Eine Insel mit 300+ Bürgern, die alle ein Zuhause haben.
description.french: Atteignez 300 Bonzommes sur une île. Tous avec un logement.
description.italian: Fai in modo che la popolazione di un'isola superi i 300 abitanti, tutti alloggiati in case
description.spanish: Ten una isla con más de 300 compas con vivienda.
description.schinese: 让一个岛上小屁人人口超过300，且人人都有家
description.russian: Поселите на одном острове и обеспечьте жильем не менее 300 человек.
description.turkish: Bir Adada 300'den fazla İnsan bulunsun ve hepsinin evleri olsun
description.brazilian: Tenha uma ilha com mais de 300 Migs, todos com lares
description.japanese: 島の人口を300人以上にして、全員の住居を確保する

description.english: Have one Island with 200+ Peeps, all happy and housed
description.german: Eine Insel mit 200+ Bürgern, die alle zufrieden sind und ein Zuhause haben.
description.french: Atteignez 200 Bonzommes sur une île. Tous heureux et avec un logement.
description.italian: Fai in modo che la popolazione di un'isola superi i 200 abitanti, tutti felici e alloggiati in case
description.spanish: Ten una isla con más de 200 compas felices y con vivienda.
description.schinese: 让一个岛上小屁人人口超过200，人人都有家而且满意
description.russian: Поселите на одном острове и обеспечьте жильем не менее 200 счастливых людей.
description.turkish: Bir Adada 200'den fazla İnsan bulunsun, hepsi mutlu olsun ve hepsinin evleri olsun
description.brazilian: Tenha uma ilha com mais de 200 Migs, todos felizes e com lares
description.japanese: 島の人口を200人以上にして、全員の家と幸福を確保する

description.english: Have 100+ Peeps, all happy and housed, on an Island that's never had fields or Extractor, Industry or Quality of Life buildings on it
description.german: 100+ Bürger, alle zufrieden und mit Zuhause, auf einer Insel, auf der es nie Felder, Ressourcen-, Industrie- oder Lebensqualitätsgebäude gab.
description.french: Atteignez 100 Bonzommes sur une île qui n'a jamais abrité de champs, d'extracteur, d'industrie ou de bâtiment de qualité de vie. Tous heureux et avec un logement.
description.italian: Raggiungi una popolazione di almeno 100 abitanti, tutti felici e alloggiati in case, su un'isola che non ha mai avuto campi o edifici per l'estrazione, l'industria o la qualità della vita
description.spanish: Ten a más de 100 compas felices y con vivienda en una isla sin campos ni edificios de calidad de vida, industria o extracción.
description.schinese: 让一个岛上小屁人人口超过100，人人都有家而且满意；同时该岛屿上从未建设过田地、提取器、工业或生活质量建筑
description.russian: Поселите не менее 100 счастливых людей, обеспеченных жильем, на острове, где никогда не было полей, экстрактора, индустриальных зданий и зданий, повышающих качество жизни.
description.turkish: Üzerinde hiç tarlalar ya da Çıkarıcı, Sanayi veya Hayat Kalitesi binaları bulunmamış bir Adada 100'den fazla İnsan bulunsun, hepsi mutlu olsun ve hepsinin evi olsun
description.brazilian: Tenha mais de 100 Migs, todos felizes e com lares, numa ilha que nunca teve campos ou construções de Extração, Indústria ou Qualidade de Vida
description.japanese: 畑、抽出施設、産業施設、QOL施設のない島の人口を100人以上にして、全員の家と幸福を確保する

description.english: Repair Spaceship without ever demolishing a Forest
description.german: Repariere das Raumschiff, ohne jemals einen Wald zu zerstören.
description.french: Réparez un vaisseau sans détruire une seule forêt.
description.italian: Ripara l'astronave senza mai demolire una foresta
description.spanish: Repara la aeronave sin talar un solo bosque.
description.schinese: 在不拆除森林的情况下修好飞船
description.russian: Отремонтируйте космический корабль, не вырубив ни одного леса.
description.turkish: Tek bir Ormanı dahi yıkmadan Uzay Gemisi onar
description.brazilian: Conserte uma Espaçonave sem demolir uma floresta
description.japanese: 森を解体することなく宇宙船を修理する

description.english: Have 100 Peeps on an Island without ever building a School there
description.german: Habe 100 Bürger auf einer Insel, ohne dort jemals eine Schule zu bauen.
description.french: Atteignez 100 Bonzommes sur une île sans jamais y construire d'école.
description.italian: Raggiungi una popolazione di 100 abitanti su un'isola senza mai costruire una scuola
description.spanish: Ten a más de 100 compas en una isla sin una sola escuela.
description.schinese: 让一个岛屿上小屁人人口达到100，且该岛屿上从未建筑过学校
description.russian: Поселите на острове 100 человек, не строя там школу.
description.turkish: Bir Adada 100 İnsan bulunsun ama hiç Okul inşa edilmesin
description.brazilian: Tenha 100 Migs numa ilha sem nunca ter construído uma Escola nela
description.japanese: 「小人たちの制限」モードをオフにして、学校を一度も建てずに島の人口を100人以上にする

description.english: Finish the game without ever building a cleaner
description.german: Beende das Spiel, ohne jemals einen Reiniger zu bauen.
description.french: Terminez le jeu sans jamais construire de purificateur.
description.italian: Completa il gioco senza mai costruire un purificatore
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin construir una depuradora.
description.schinese: 在从未建造过清洁工厂的情况下完成游戏
description.russian: Закончите игру, ни разу не построив очиститель.
description.turkish: Oyunu tek bir temizleme tesisi inşa etmeden bitir
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo sem nunca ter construído um Purificador
description.japanese: 汚染除去装置を一度も作らずゲームをクリアする

displayName.english: Variety is the Spice of Life
displayName.french: La diversité est le sel de la vie
displayName.italian: La vita è bella perché è varia
displayName.spanish: En la variedad está el gusto
displayName.brazilian: A Variedade é o Tempero da Vida

description.english: Colonise Islands of all 6 biomes and have a population of at least 50 Peeps on each of them
description.german: Besiedle Inseln aller 6 Biome und habe eine Bevölkerung von mindestens 50 Bürgern auf jeder Insel.
description.french: Colonisez des îles des 6 biomes et atteignez une population d'au moins 50 Bonzommes sur chacune d'elle.
description.italian: Colonizza isole di tutti e 6 i biomi e raggiungi una popolazione di almeno 50 abitanti su ciascuna di esse
description.spanish: Coloniza islas en los seis biomas y alcanza una población mínima de 50 compas en cada una.
description.schinese: 在全部六种生态的岛屿上殖民，且每座岛上至少有50个小屁人
description.russian: Заселите острова во всех 6 биомах. На каждом из этих островов должно быть не менее 50 жителей.
description.turkish: 6 biyomun hepsinden Adalar kolonileştir ve her birinde en az 50 İnsanlık nüfus bulunsun
description.brazilian: Colonize ilhas com todos os 6 biomas e tenha uma população de pelo menos 50 Migs em cada um deles
description.japanese: すべてのバイオームの島を発見し（全6種類）、それぞれの人口を50人以上にする

description.english: 50+ Peeps, all happy, on an inner or outer Planet Island, fed with only potatoes and water
description.german: 50+ Bürger, alle zufrieden, auf einer inneren oder äußeren Planeteninsel, nur mit Kartoffeln und Wasser ernährt.
description.french: Atteignez 50 Bonzommes, sur une île d'une planète proche ou éloignée, en ne les nourrissant que de pommes de terre et d'eau.
description.italian: Nutri solo con patate e acqua almeno 50 abitanti, tutti felici, su un'isola di un pianeta interno o esterno
description.spanish: Ten a más de 50 compas felices en una isla de un planeta interior o exterior y mantenlos a base de patatas y agua.
description.schinese: 在一个内部或外部星球岛屿上拥有50个以上的小屁人，全部满意，而且只消耗土豆和水。
description.russian: Поселите на самой ближней или самой дальней от солнца планете не менее 50 счастливых людей, рацион которых состоит из воды и картошки.
description.turkish: Bir iç veya dış Gezegen Adasında 50'den fazla insan, hepsi mutlu, sadece patates ve suyla besleniyorlar
description.brazilian: Tenha mais de 50 Migs, todos felizes, numa ilha de um Planeta mais próximo ou mais distante do sol, alimentados apenas com batata e água
description.japanese: 内惑星の島または外惑星の島の人口を50人以上にして、ジャガイモと水だけで生活させた上で全員を幸福にする

description.english: Maintain a full Shield for 1 in-game hour around a Planet with only Wind and Solar generators
description.german: Halte einen vollen Schutzschild für 1 Spielstunde um einen Planeten ausschließlich mit Wind- und Solarkraftwerken aufrecht.
description.french: Gardez un bouclier déployé autour d'une planète pour une durée d'une heure de jeu avec seulement des générateurs solaires et éoliens.
description.italian: Mantieni un'egida attiva attorno a un pianeta per 1 ora di gioco usando solo i generatori solari ed eolici
description.spanish: Mantén un escudo durante una hora del juego solo con generadores solares y eólicos.
description.schinese: 在一个只有风能和太阳能发电厂的星球上保持护盾完整长达1个游戏内小时
description.russian: Поддерживайте полный заряд щита вокруг планеты в течение одного игрового часа, используя только гелиогенераторы и ветрогенераторы.
description.turkish: Sadece Rüzgâr ve Güneş Enerjisi Santralleri ile bir Gezegenin etrafında 1 oyun saati boyunca tam bir Kalkan tut
description.brazilian: Mantenha um Escudo integral por 1 hora do jogo em torno de um Planeta com apenas Geradores de Energia Solar e Eólica
description.japanese: 風力または太陽光発電によって（ゲーム内時間で）1時間、惑星の周囲にシールドを展開する

description.german: Schließe das Szenario „Apocalypse Soon“ ab.
description.french: Terminez le scénario Bientôt l'apocalypse.
description.italian: Completa lo scenario Apocalisse imminente
description.spanish: Completa el escenario «Próximamente: el apocalipsis».
description.schinese: 完成末日将近场景
description.turkish: Kıyamet Yakın senaryosunu tamamla
description.brazilian: Conclua a situação 'O Fim do Mundo'
description.japanese: シナリオ「アポカリプス到来」を完了する

description.english: Lose 20+ buildings in one whale attack
description.german: Verliere 20+ Gebäude durch einen einzigen Walangriff.
description.french: Perdez au moins 20 bâtiments au cours d'une attaque de baleine.
description.italian: Perdi almeno 20 edifici in un unico attacco di balena
description.spanish: Pierde más de 20 edificios en un ataque de ballenas.
description.schinese: 在一次鲸鱼攻击中失去20座以上的建筑
description.russian: Потеряйте не менее 20 построек во время нападения одного кита.
description.turkish: Bir balina saldırısında 20'den fazla yapı kaybet
description.brazilian: Perca mais de 20 construções durante um ataque de baleia
description.japanese: 1回のクジラの襲撃で20以上の施設を失う

description.english: Destroy a Ship by creating crystal Island under it
description.german: Zerstöre ein Schiff, indem du eine Kristallinsel unter ihm erschaffst.
description.french: Détruisez un navire en créant une île de cristal en dessous.
description.italian: Distruggi una nave creando un'isola dei cristalli al di sotto di essa
description.spanish: Destruye un buque al crear una isla de cristal debajo.
description.schinese: 在船只下方创造水晶之岛，从而摧毁船只
description.russian: Разрушьте корабль, создав под ним кристальный остров.
description.turkish: Altında Kristal Adası oluşturarak bir Gemiyi yok et
description.brazilian: Destrua um navio criando uma Ilha de Cristal debaixo dele
description.japanese: 船の下にクリスタルの島を作成して船を破壊する

description.english: Have 100+ Peeps in a game, all of them Very Sad
description.german: Habe 100+ Bürger in einem Spiel, die alle sehr traurig sind.
description.french: Atteignez 100 Bonzommes au cours d'une partie. Tous très tristes.
description.italian: Durante una partita, devi avere almeno 100 abitanti tutti molto tristi
description.spanish: Ten a más de 100 compas muy tristes en la misma partida.
description.schinese: 在游戏中拥有100个以上的小屁人，且均非常不满意
description.russian: В игре должно быть не менее 100 жителей, все — очень печальные.
description.turkish: Bir oyunda 100'den fazla İnsana sahip ol, hepsi Çok Üzgün olsun
description.brazilian: Tenha mais de 100 Migs em uma partida, todos muito tristes
description.japanese: 「とても悲しい」小人たちを100人以上ゲームに登場させる

displayName.french: Dans quoi j'ai mis les pieds ?
displayName.brazilian: No que Foi que Eu Pisei?

description.english: Have a Planet with every Island tile polluted (apart from tiny islands), with default pollution difficulty settings
description.german: Besitze einen Planeten, auf dem alle Inselkacheln verschmutzt sind (abgesehen von winzigen Inseln), mit dem Standard-Schwierigkeitsgrad für Verschmutzung.
description.french: Polluez toutes les cases île d'une planète (à l'exception des toutes petites îles), avec les paramètres de pollution par défaut.
description.italian: Possiedi un pianeta con tutte le caselle delle isole inquinate (tranne le isole minuscole), con la difficoltà dell'inquinamento impostata su predefinita
description.spanish: Ten un planeta con todas las casillas de isla contaminadas (salvo las islas diminutas) con la dificultad predeterminada.
description.schinese: 一个星球上每个岛屿地块都被污染（除了微型岛屿），且游戏难度为默认污染难度
description.russian: Добейтесь того, чтобы при настройках загрязнения по умолчанию на планете были загрязнены все островные клетки (за исключением крохотных островов).
description.turkish: Varsayılan kirlilik zorluk ayarlarıyla her Ada altıgeni (küçük adalar dışında) kirlenmiş bir Gezegene sahip ol
description.brazilian: Tenha um Planeta com todas as células das ilhas poluídas (com exceção das ilhotas), na dificuldade padrão de poluição
description.japanese: デフォルトの汚染難易度設定で、1つの惑星のすべての島タイルを汚染させる（極小の島を除く）

description.german: Schließe das Szenario „Saatgutjäger“ ab.
description.french: Terminez le scénario Chasseur de graines.
description.italian: Completa lo scenario A caccia di semi
description.spanish: Completa el escenario «En busca de semillas».
description.schinese: 完成种子猎人场景
description.turkish: Tohum Avcısı senaryosunu tamamla
description.brazilian: Conclua a situação 'Caçador de Sementes'
description.japanese: シナリオ「シードハンター」を完了する

description.german: Schließe das Szenario „Hütteneigentümergemeinschaft“ ab.
description.french: Terminez le scénario Association des propriétaires de cabane.
description.italian: Completa lo scenario Associazione dei proprietari di capanne
description.spanish: Completa el escenario «Asociación de Propietarios de Chozas».
description.schinese: 完成屋主协会场景
description.turkish: Kulübe Sahipleri Derneği senaryosunu tamamla
description.brazilian: Conclua a situação 'Associação dos Donos de Cabanas'
description.japanese: シナリオ「小屋主協会」を完了する

description.german: Schließe das Szenario „Immer schön fleißig“ ab.
description.french: Terminez le scénario Retroussez vos manches.
description.italian: Completa lo scenario Cicogne a go go
description.spanish: Completa el escenario «Al huerto».
description.schinese: 完成忙起来场景
description.turkish: Küçük Bir İşimiz Var senaryosunu tamamla
description.brazilian: Conclua a situação 'Atarefados'
description.japanese: シナリオ「多忙化」を完了する

description.german: Erschaffe 500 Bürger über alle Spiele hinweg.
description.french: Atteignez 500 Bonzommes toutes parties confondues.
description.italian: Genera 500 abitanti in totale nelle partite
description.spanish: Crea 500 compas entre todas las partidas.
description.schinese: 在所有游戏中累计创造500个小屁人
description.turkish: Tüm oyunlar genelinde 500 İnsan oluştur
description.brazilian: Crie 500 Migs ao longo de todas as partidas
description.japanese: 500人の小人たちを作成する

description.german: Besiedle 20 Inseln über alle Spiele hinweg.
description.french: Colonisez 20 îles toutes parties confondues.
description.italian: Colonizza 20 isole in totale nelle partite
description.spanish: Coloniza 20 islas entre todas las partidas.
description.schinese: 在所有游戏中累计殖民20个岛屿
description.turkish: Tüm oyunlar genelinde 20 Ada kolonileştir
description.brazilian: Colonize 20 ilhas ao longo de todas as partidas
description.japanese: 20の島に定住する

description.english: Survive 20 Whale Attacks across all games
description.german: Überlebe 20 Walangriffe über alle Spiele hinweg.
description.french: Survivez à 20 attaques de baleine toutes parties confondues.
description.italian: Sopravvivi a 20 attacchi di balena in totale nelle partite
description.spanish: Sobrevive a 20 ataques de ballenas entre todas las partidas.
description.schinese: 在所有游戏中累计从20次鲸鱼袭击中存活下来
description.turkish: Tüm oyunlar genelinde 20 Balina Saldırısından sağ kurtul
description.brazilian: Sobreviva a 20 ataques de baleia ao longo de todas as partidas
description.japanese: クジラの襲撃から20回生還する

description.english: Use a Transmogrifier 30 times across all games
description.german: Benutze 30-mal einen Umwandler über alle Spiele hinweg.
description.french: Utilisez un transmogrifieur 30 fois toutes parties confondues.
description.italian: Usa un trasmogrificatore 30 volte in totale nelle partite
description.spanish: Usa el transmogrificador 30 veces entre todas las partidas.
description.schinese: 在所有游戏中累计使用变形器30次
description.turkish: Tüm oyunlar genelinde 30 kez Dönüştürücü kullan
description.brazilian: Use um Transmogrificador 30 vezes ao longo de todas as partidas
description.japanese: 変換マシンを30回使用する

description.german: Erschaffe 100 Geräte über alle Spiele hinweg.
description.french: Fabriquez 100 gadgets toutes parties confondues.
description.italian: Fabbrica 100 gadget in totale nelle partite
description.spanish: Fabrica 100 aparatos entre todas las partidas.
description.schinese: 在所有游戏中制造100个小工具
description.turkish: Tüm oyunlar genelinde 100 Cihaz yap
description.brazilian: Faça 100 bugigangas ao longo de todas as partidas
description.japanese: ガジェットを100個製造する

description.german: Baue 10 Raumschiffe über alle Spiele hinweg.
description.french: Construisez 10 vaisseaux spatiaux toutes parties confondues.
description.italian: Costruisci 10 astronavi in totale nelle partite
description.spanish: Construye 10 aeronaves entre todas las partidas.
description.schinese: 在所有游戏中累计建造10艘飞船
description.turkish: Tüm oyunlar genelinde 10 Uzay Gemisi inşa et
description.brazilian: Construa 10 espaçonaves ao longo de todas as partidas
description.japanese: 宇宙船を10回建造する

description.german: Baue 20 Schiffe über alle Spiele hinweg.
description.french: Construisez 20 navires toutes parties confondues.
description.italian: Costruisci 20 navi in totale nelle partite
description.spanish: Construye 20 buques entre todas las partidas.
description.schinese: 在所有游戏中累计建造20艘船只
description.turkish: Tüm oyunlar genelinde 20 Gemi inşa et
description.brazilian: Construa 20 navios ao longo de todas as partidas
description.japanese: 船を20回建造する

description.german: Zerstöre 100 Wälder über alle Spiele hinweg.
description.french: Détruisez 100 forêts toutes parties confondues.
description.italian: Demolisci 100 foreste in totale nelle partite
description.spanish: Tala 100 bosques entre todas las partidas.
description.schinese: 在所有游戏中累计拆除100座森林
description.turkish: Tüm oyunlar genelinde 100 Orman yık
description.brazilian: Destrua 100 florestas ao longo de todas as partidas
description.japanese: 森を100回解体する
